description: This file appears to be a PHP source file for a web page involved in a network setup wizard. It contains PHP includes, HTML markup, embedded JavaScript for client-side validation and interaction, and server communication functions. The content indicates it handles password updates, form validation, and step navigation within a wizard UI.

methods.name: getInstanceNum
methods.description: Determines the user instance number based on the session's login user.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends an AJAX request to set the new password configuration during the wizard step.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates password inputs and initiates configuration update for proceeding to the next wizard step.
